name: nevaberry-plugins
description: Knowledge patches for programming languages and frameworks - updates Claude's knowledge about latest features

plugins.name: typescript-knowledge-patch
plugins.description: TypeScript knowledge patch - updates Claude's knowledge about TypeScript 5.9+ features including import defer, --module node20, and TS7 transition

plugins.name: nextjs-knowledge-patch
plugins.description: Next.js knowledge patch - updates Claude's knowledge about Next.js 15.3-16.x features including proxy.ts, "use cache", Cache Components, navigation hooks, typed routes, and breaking changes

plugins.name: bun-knowledge-patch
plugins.description: Bun knowledge patch - updates Claude's knowledge about Bun 1.3.8 features including Bun-specific APIs, bun:* modules, Bun.serve(), bundler features, or any Bun features from 1.2+ (2025-2026)

plugins.name: rust-knowledge-patch
plugins.description: Rust knowledge patch - updates Claude's knowledge about Rust 1.85-1.93 features including Edition 2024, async closures, and new collection methods

plugins.name: dioxus-knowledge-patch
plugins.description: Dioxus knowledge patch - updates Claude's knowledge about Dioxus 0.7.3 features including subsecond hot-patching, WASM splitting, Manganis assets, and Stores

plugins.name: postgis-knowledge-patch
plugins.description: PostGIS knowledge patch - updates Claude's knowledge about PostGIS 3.5-3.6.1 features including spatial functions, geography types, raster operations, and topology

plugins.name: postgresql-knowledge-patch
plugins.description: PostgreSQL knowledge patch - updates Claude's knowledge about PostgreSQL 17-18.1 features including MERGE, JSON functions, virtual generated columns, and temporal constraints

plugins.name: python-knowledge-patch
plugins.description: Python knowledge patch - updates Claude's knowledge about Python 3.13-3.14 features including t-strings, deferred annotation evaluation, free-threaded Python, subinterpreters, and zstd compression
